textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello System Admin,


For below Collaboration Opportunity, no RGC Collaboration Detail is Available.


IDName
{!$Record.Id}{!$Record.Collaboration_Opportunity__r.Name}


Note: This is a system generated email, do not reply to this.
